long_description: The classic MSR Alpine 2 pot set brings reliability, durability and lightness to a cookset that's just as at home on a big wall as it is in the remote wilderness. Stainless-steel pots nest for compact storage. Set includes Alpine 1.5- and 2-liter pots, lid/fry pan, PanHandler(TM) and reusable nylon stuff sack. PanHandler whisper-light pot lifter works perfectly with all MSR cookware, supporting up to 10 lbs. Most MSR stoves fit inside the nested pots for extreme compactibility. Scratch and dent resistant stainless-steel stands up in the most rugged conditions. Rounded corners help heat travel up sides of pot more quickly, boosting efficiency.
short_description: The classic MSR Alpine 2 pot set brings reliability, durability and lightness to a cookset that's just as at home on a big wall as it is in the remote wilderness.
